QuestData.Title: Rocknot's Ale
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh, ale! I would kill for some Dark Iron ale!! Quick, I'm getting sober! I know this because sobriety blurs my vision... and it's making you look like the $r I slew last week!
QuestData.RewardText: What's this? Ah! It smells like Dark Iron Ale! Drink has blurred my sight, but I can tell that you, $gsir:my lady;, are a real friend!
